com.emitrom.flash4j.flex.client.mx.bindings

Class ChangeWather

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emitrom.flash4j.core.client.ProxyObject
      • com.emitrom.flash4j.flex.client.mx.bindings.ChangeWather

  • public class ChangeWather
extends ProxyObject
    The ChangeWatcher class defines utility methods that you can use with bindable Flex properties. These methods let you define an event handler that is executed whenever a bindable property is updated.
